about_the_game:
Endless Desert TD is a unique fusion of tower defense strategy and roguelike elements, designed for quick play sessions. Experience the perfect blend of strategic tower defense with the unpredictability of roguelike gameplay. Each run offers a fresh challenge with new levels, enemies, and rewards, making it ideal for short but satisfying gaming sessions. Upon completing runs, higher difficulty levels will be unlocked, providing even more challenging gameplay.

Roguelike structure
Each run is randomly generated with different maps, paths, enemies and rewards. You'll need to adapt your strategy on the fly based on the rewards available for you to choose from and the enemies that appear.



Gameplay
Each run presents a new world map with different paths. Choose your path and conquer the challenges that await you.
Upon completing each level, you'll be presented with a random selection of rewards to choose from. You'll face a boss encounter at the conclusion of every map.



Towers
Experiment with different tower combinations and discover your own winning strategy. Upgrade your towers as you progress to confront increasingly formidable foes, and adapt to the ever-changing challenges that a roguelike world presents.
